dt: {bc}an act or rite of dedicating {dx_def}see {dxt|dedicate:2||1}{/dx_def} to a divine being or to a sacred use
{bc}a devoting or setting aside for a particular purpose

dt.t: the {wi}dedication{/wi} of funds raised from the bake sale to the class trip

dt: {bc}a name and often a message {d_link|prefixed|prefix:1} to a literary, musical, or artistic production in tribute to a person or cause

dt.t: mentioned his family in a brief {wi}dedication{/wi} in his novel

dt: {bc}a ceremony to mark the official completion or opening of something (such as a building)

dt.t: attended the building's {wi}dedication{/wi} nearly fifty years ago

shortdef: an act or rite of dedicating to a divine being or to a sacred use
a devoting or setting aside for a particular purpose
a name and often a message prefixed to a literary, musical, or artistic production in tribute to a person or cause
